metadata.description: Research-driven project scaffolding with design systems, database/ORM setup, and Railway deployment. Supports SwiftUI, Jetpack Compose, Kotlin XML, Flutter, Expo React Native, Node/Express, FastAPI, Flask, Django, Rust, Next.js, Nuxt.js, and Turborepo monorepos.

plugins.name: eagle-multi-stack-scaffolder
plugins.description: Research-driven scaffolding with design systems, database/ORM setup (PostgreSQL, Prisma, Drizzle, SQLAlchemy), object storage (MinIO), and Railway deployment. Supports SwiftUI, Jetpack Compose, Kotlin XML, Flutter, Expo React Native, Node/Express, FastAPI, Flask, Django, Rust, Next.js, Nuxt.js, and Turborepo monorepos. Includes Material 3, Cupertino, NativeWind patterns.
